verbs.description: Retired NBA star Dennis Rodman [V: has] revealed what he thinks about Kim Jong - un and Donald Trump meeting for historic peace talks in Singapore , on Tuesday .
[ARG0: Retired NBA star Dennis Rodman] has [V: revealed] [ARG1: what he thinks about Kim Jong - un and Donald Trump meeting for historic peace talks in Singapore , on Tuesday] .
